contact.heading: Contact us
contact.subheading: Questions about delivery, returns, or a product? Send a message and we’ll help.
contact.intro_1: We help across UAE with Amazon returns, exchanges, and delivery coordination.
contact.intro_2: Call, WhatsApp, or send a message — we reply fast.
contact.name: Name
contact.message_hint: Include your order number and a short summary so we can help faster.
contact.success: Thanks for contacting us. We’ll get back to you soon.
contact.service_returns_copy: We guide you through every step of returns and exchanges.
contact.service_delivery_copy: Tracking + concierge delivery experience across UAE.
contact.service_support_copy: Chat, call, or email, and we answer within minutes.
contact.panel_reach_us_copy: Choose the fastest option for you — we’ll guide you step by step.
contact.address_fallback: Add your pickup address in the section settings.
contact.phone_fallback: Add your phone number in the section settings.
contact.email_fallback: Add your email in the section settings.
contact.map_copy: Open directions in Google Maps, or use the embed below.
contact.cta_title: Need a quick reply while shopping?
contact.cta_detail: Our support desk is live every day to guide you through returns, deliveries, and product sourcing.
contact.footer_note: Tip: For the fastest response, include your order number and a WhatsApp-friendly phone number.
contact.faq_title: We answer the most common questions
contact.faq_subtitle: Quick answers before you message us.
contact.faq1_question: How fast can I get a pickup for an Amazon return?
contact.faq1_answer: We can usually pick up returns within 24 hours of your request inside UAE — just message us on WhatsApp or email info@blackfridaydeals-uae.com.
contact.faq2_answer: Yes, COD refunds are handled via wallet balances, bank transfers, or direct cash deliveries depending on your area.
contact.faq3_answer: We support customers across UAE. Message us with your location and we’ll confirm timing and availability.
contact.faq4_question: What should I include in my message?
contact.faq4_answer: Share your order number (if you have one), your phone number, and a clear description of what you need.
contact.form_subtitle: Leave your details and we’ll reply as soon as possible.

about.subtitle_fallback: We curate Black Friday deals across the UAE and help shoppers find the best value fast.
about.value_1_copy: Clear pricing, verified offers, and honest recommendations.
about.value_2_copy: We keep the best deals easy to find when it matters most.
about.value_3_copy: Need help choosing? We guide you quickly and clearly.

products_page.title: Products
products_page.subtitle: Browse our collection and find the best deals available right now.

footer.tagline: Black Friday deals · Amazon returns in UAE

hello_world.title: Hello, world!
hello_world.intro_1: The Skeleton theme is a minimal, carefully structured Shopify theme designed to help you quickly get started. Designed with modularity, maintainability, and Shopify's best practices in mind.
hello_world.intro_2: Themes shape the online store experience for merchants and their customers. Build fast, flexible themes at scale using Liquid, Shopify's theme templating language, along with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and JSON.
hello_world.key_concepts_copy: Shopify themes are a package of template files, building blocks, and supporting assets. Use these building blocks to create modular, customizable themes.
hello_world.liquid_copy: The Liquid templating language is the backbone of Shopify themes, and is used to load dynamic content on storefronts. Extend Liquid objects to store and present custom data using metafields.
hello_world.best_practices_copy: To optimize your theme development experience, Shopify has established a set of best practices that you can refer to when developing your theme and setting up your toolchains and processes.

refund_policy.intro_html: We want you to feel confident shopping with {{ shop_name }}. If something isn’t right, we’ll help you with returns and refunds.
refund_policy.summary_condition: Items must be unused and in original packaging (unless defective).
refund_policy.summary_refunds: Approved refunds are issued back to the original payment method.
refund_policy.summary_processing: Refund processing time: {{ min_days }}–{{ max_days }} business days after inspection.
refund_policy.eligibility_1: Start a return within {{ days }} days of delivery.
refund_policy.eligibility_2: Keep items unused, unwashed, and with original tags/packaging.
refund_policy.eligibility_3: Provide proof of purchase (order number or receipt).
refund_policy.non_returnable_2: Personal care items once opened (for hygiene reasons).
refund_policy.non_returnable_3: Items marked final sale (if stated at purchase).
refund_policy.start_1: Contact us with your order number and the item(s) you’d like to return.
refund_policy.start_2: We’ll confirm eligibility and share return instructions or pickup options.
refund_policy.start_3: Pack the item securely and include all accessories and original packaging.
refund_policy.refunds_1: Once your return is received and inspected, we’ll notify you of approval or rejection.
refund_policy.refunds_2: If approved, your refund is processed within {{ min_days }}–{{ max_days }} business days. Your bank or card provider may take additional time to post the refund.
refund_policy.damaged_1: If you received a damaged or incorrect item, contact us as soon as possible.
refund_policy.damaged_2: Send a clear photo of the item and packaging so we can resolve it quickly.
refund_policy.contact_intro: Contact our support team and we’ll guide you step by step.
refund_policy.contact_fallback: Add contact details in the section settings.

shipping_policy.intro_html: Thank you for shopping with {{ shop_name }}. Our goal is to deliver quickly and reliably across the UAE with clear tracking and support.
shipping_policy.summary_free_shipping: Shipping charges: free shipping on all orders.
shipping_policy.summary_tracking: Tracking: you’ll receive tracking information once your order ships.
shipping_policy.summary_processing: Processing time: {{ min_days }}–{{ max_days }} business days.
shipping_policy.order_confirmation_1: After you place your order, you’ll receive an order confirmation email. This means we’ve received your order and pre-authorized your payment.
shipping_policy.order_confirmation_2: If you don’t see the email, please check your spam folder.
shipping_policy.tracking_1: Once your order ships, we’ll email you the tracking number and shipping updates.
shipping_policy.charges_free: We offer free shipping on all orders within {{ region }}.
shipping_policy.charges_paid: Shipping charges are shown at checkout based on your delivery address and service level.
shipping_policy.processing_handling: Handling time: {{ min_days }}–{{ max_days }} business days (Monday to Friday).
shipping_policy.processing_transit: Transit time: {{ min_days }}–{{ max_days }} business days (Monday to Friday).
shipping_policy.processing_cutoff_note: Orders placed before {{ time }} are usually processed the same day.
shipping_policy.acceptance_1: We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order for any reason, including stock availability, address issues, or suspected fraud.
shipping_policy.acceptance_2: We may request additional verification information (such as phone number or address) before accepting an order.
shipping_policy.customs_1: For deliveries within the UAE, customs duties are not typically applicable. If any fees are imposed by a carrier or authority, they are the customer’s responsibility.
shipping_policy.contact_intro: Need help with shipping, delivery status, or tracking? Contact us and we’ll reply as fast as possible.
shipping_policy.contact_fallback: Add contact details in the section settings.

privacy_policy.intro_html: This privacy policy explains how {{ shop_name }} collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our website.
privacy_policy.empty_fallback: Add your privacy policy in Shopify admin (Settings → Policies) or add content to this page.
privacy_policy.contact_intro: If you have questions about this privacy policy, contact us and we’ll help.
privacy_policy.contact_fallback: Add contact details in the section settings.

terms_of_service.intro_html: These terms help keep shopping safe and fair for everyone using {{ shop_name }}.
terms_of_service.body_01_html:
Overview

This website is operated by {{ shop_name }}. Throughout the site, the terms “we”, “us” and “our” refer to {{ shop_name }}.
terms_of_service.body_02_html: {{ shop_name }} offers this website, including all information, tools, and services available from this site to you, the user, conditioned upon your acceptance of all terms, conditions, policies, and notices stated here.
terms_of_service.body_03_html: By visiting our site and/or purchasing something from us, you engage in our “Service” and agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions (“Terms of service”, “Terms”), including those additional terms and conditions and policies referenced herein and/or available by hyperlink.
terms_of_service.body_04_html:
These Terms of service apply to all users of the site, including without limitation users who are browsers, vendors, customers, merchants, and/or contributors of content.

Please read these Terms of service carefully before accessing or using our website. By accessing or using any part of the site, you agree to be bound by these Terms of service.
terms_of_service.body_05_html:
If you do not agree to all the terms and conditions of this agreement, then you may not access the website or use any services.

Any new features or tools which are added to the current store shall also be subject to the Terms of service.
terms_of_service.body_06_html:
You can review the most current version of the Terms of service at any time on this page. We reserve the right to update, change, or replace any part of these Terms of service by posting updates and/or changes to our website. It is your responsibility to check this page periodically for changes.

Your continued use of or access to the website following the posting of any changes constitutes acceptance of those changes.

Our store is hosted on Shopify Inc. They provide us with the online e-commerce platform that allows us to sell our products and services to you.
terms_of_service.body_07b_html: By agreeing to these Terms of service, you represent that you are at least the age of majority in your place of residence, or that you are the age of majority and you have given us your consent to allow any of your minor dependents to use this site.
terms_of_service.body_07c_html: You may not use our products for any illegal or unauthorized purpose nor may you, in the use of the Service, violate any laws in your jurisdiction (including but not limited to copyright laws).
terms_of_service.body_07d_html: You must not transmit any worms or viruses or any code of a destructive nature. A breach or violation of any of the Terms will result in an immediate termination of your services.
terms_of_service.body_08b_html: We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason at any time.
terms_of_service.body_08c_html: You understand that your content (not including credit card information) may be transferred unencrypted and involve transmissions over various networks and changes to conform and adapt to technical requirements of connecting networks or devices. Credit card information is always encrypted during transfer over networks.
terms_of_service.body_08d_html: You agree not to reproduce, duplicate, copy, sell, resell, or exploit any portion of the Service, use of the Service, or access to the Service or any contact on the website through which the Service is provided, without express written permission by us.
terms_of_service.body_08e_html: The headings used in this agreement are included for convenience only and will not limit or otherwise affect these Terms.
terms_of_service.body_09a_html: Section 3 - Accuracy, completeness, and timeliness of information
terms_of_service.body_09b_html: We are not responsible if information made available on this site is not accurate, complete, or current. The material on this site is provided for general information only and should not be relied upon as the sole basis for making decisions without consulting more accurate sources. Any reliance on the material on this site is at your own risk.
terms_of_service.body_09c_html: This site may contain certain historical information. Historical information is not current and is provided for your reference only. We reserve the right to modify the contents of this site at any time, but we have no obligation to update any information on our site. You agree that it is your responsibility to monitor changes to our site.
terms_of_service.body_10a_html:
Section 4 - Modifications to the service and prices

Prices for our products are subject to change without notice.

We reserve the right at any time to modify or discontinue the Service (or any part or content thereof) without notice at any time. We shall not be liable to you or to any third-party for any modification, price change, suspension, or discontinuance of the Service.
terms_of_service.body_10b_html:
Section 5 - Products or services (if applicable)

Certain products or services may be available exclusively online through the website. These products or services may have limited quantities and are subject to return or exchange only according to our refund policy.

We have made every effort to display as accurately as possible the colors and images of our products that appear at the store. We cannot guarantee that your computer monitor's display of any color will be accurate.
terms_of_service.body_10c1_html: We reserve the right, but are not obligated, to limit the sales of our products or services to any person, geographic region, or jurisdiction. We may exercise this right on a case-by-case basis. We reserve the right to limit the quantities of any products or services that we offer.
terms_of_service.body_10c2_html: All descriptions of products or product pricing are subject to change at any time without notice, at the sole discretion of us. We reserve the right to discontinue any product at any time. Any offer for any product or service made on this site is void where prohibited.
terms_of_service.body_10c3_html: We do not warrant that the quality of any products, services, information, or other material purchased or obtained by you will meet your expectations, or that any errors in the Service will be corrected.
terms_of_service.body_11a1_html:
Section 6 - Accuracy of billing and account information

We reserve the right to refuse any order you place with us. We may, in our sole discretion, limit or cancel quantities purchased per person, per household, or per order. These restrictions may include orders placed by or under the same customer account, the same credit card, and/or orders that use the same billing and/or shipping address.
terms_of_service.body_11a2_html: In the event that we make a change to or cancel an order, we may attempt to notify you by contacting the email and/or billing address/phone number provided at the time the order was made.
terms_of_service.body_11b_html:
You agree to provide current, complete, and accurate purchase and account information for all purchases made at our store. You agree to promptly update your account and other information, including your email address and payment details, so that we can complete your transactions and contact you as needed.

For more details, please review our refund policy.
terms_of_service.body_12a_html:
Section 7 - Optional tools

We may provide you with access to third-party tools over which we neither monitor nor have any control nor input. You acknowledge and agree that we provide access to such tools “as is” and “as available” without any warranties, representations, or conditions of any kind and without any endorsement.
terms_of_service.body_12b_html: We shall have no liability whatsoever arising from or relating to your use of optional third-party tools. Any use by you of optional tools offered through the site is entirely at your own risk and discretion.
terms_of_service.body_12c_html: You should ensure that you are familiar with and approve of the terms on which tools are provided by the relevant third-party provider(s). We may also offer new services and/or features through the website which will also be subject to these Terms of service.
terms_of_service.body_12d_html:
Section 8 - Third-party links

Certain content, products, and services available via our Service may include materials from third-parties. Third-party links may direct you to third-party websites that are not affiliated with us.
terms_of_service.body_12e_html: We are not responsible for examining or evaluating third-party content or accuracy and we do not warrant and will not have any liability or responsibility for third-party materials, websites, products, or services.
terms_of_service.body_12f_html: Please review the third-party's policies and practices before you engage in any transaction. Complaints, claims, concerns, or questions regarding third-party products should be directed to the third-party.
terms_of_service.body_12g_html:
Section 9 - User comments, feedback, and other submissions

If you send us submissions or comments, you agree that we may use them without restriction, including editing, copying, publishing, distributing, translating, and otherwise using them in any medium.
terms_of_service.body_12h_html: We are under no obligation to maintain comments in confidence, to pay compensation for comments, or to respond to comments. You are solely responsible for your comments and their accuracy.
terms_of_service.body_12i_html:
Section 10 - Personal information

Your submission of personal information through the store is governed by our privacy policy.
terms_of_service.body_12j_html:
Section 11 - Errors, inaccuracies, and omissions

We reserve the right to correct errors and to change or update information or cancel orders if any information is inaccurate at any time without prior notice.
terms_of_service.body_12k_html:
Section 12 - Prohibited uses

You are prohibited from using the site or its content for unlawful purposes, to violate laws, to infringe intellectual property rights, to harass or discriminate, to submit false information, to transmit malware, to scrape data, or to interfere with security features. We reserve the right to terminate your access for violations.
terms_of_service.body_12l_html:
Section 13 - Disclaimer of warranties; limitation of liability

We do not guarantee that your use of our Service will be uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error-free. The Service and all products and services delivered to you are provided “as is” and “as available”.
terms_of_service.body_12m_html: To the maximum extent permitted by law, {{ shop_name }} will not be liable for damages arising from your use of the Service.
terms_of_service.body_12n_html:
Section 14 - Indemnification

You agree to indemnify and hold harmless {{ shop_name }} and our affiliates and partners from claims arising out of your breach of these Terms or violation of law.
terms_of_service.body_12o_html:
Section 15 - Severability

If any provision is found unenforceable, the remaining provisions will remain in effect.
terms_of_service.body_12p_html:
Section 16 - Termination

These Terms are effective unless terminated by either you or us. We may terminate access if we suspect a violation of these Terms.
terms_of_service.body_12q_html:
Section 17 - Entire agreement

These Terms and any policies posted on this site constitute the entire agreement between you and us regarding use of the Service.

Section 18 - Governing law

These Terms are governed by the laws of the United Arab Emirates.
terms_of_service.body_12r_html:
Section 19 - Changes to terms of service

We may update these Terms by posting changes to our website. Continued use constitutes acceptance of those changes.

Section 20 - Contact information

Questions about the Terms of service should be sent to us using the contact details below.
terms_of_service.contact_intro: If you have questions about these terms, contact us and we’ll help.
terms_of_service.contact_fallback: Add contact details in the section settings.
